content: of either the basic beanie pattern or v1 pattern 7 skip a stitch and double_crochet in the next stitch 8 chain 1 round 17- double_crochet in all stitches around 9 double_crochet in the next stitch i e do not skip a stitch repeat round 9 10 chain 1 round 18- chain 1 space for every other stitch 11 skip a stitch and double_crochet in the next stitch repeat round 10 12 chain 1 13 skip a stitch and double_crochet in the next stitch round 19- double_crochet in all stitches around 14 chain 1 repeat round 9 15 skip a stitch and double_crochet in the next stitch finishing round optional 16 chain 1 sltst as per basic pattern 17 repeat steps 9 to 16 eight times or if preferred work an additional repeat of round 10 and then slip_stitch around as per 18 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 basic beanie pattern the beanie will be a little more slouchy stitch count 80 no increase filet rounds round 9 - double_crochet in all stitches around 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 2 double_crochet in next chain space and in each double_crochet and chain space around 3 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 stitch count 80 round 10- chain 1 space for every other stitch 1 to commence the round stndst in same stitch as slip_stitch from previous round 2 chain 1 and skip the next stitch 3 double_crochet in the next stitch 4 chain 1 and skip the next stitch 5 repeat steps 3 and 4 38 times 6 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 stitch count 40 double_crochet and 40 chain 1 space round 11- double_crochet in all stitches around repeat round 9 page | 8 variant 4 v4 multiple repeats of motif images 4 & 5 7 chain 3 and skip the next 2 double_crochet stitches and the first chain of the next previous round 3 chain 8 slip_stitch in the second middle chain of the previous round 3 chain to make beanie as per image 4 follow all instruction rounds below excluding round 9 3 chain and skip the third chain of the previous round 3 chain and the next 2 double_crochet stitches 16b 10 double_crochet twice in the next stitch to make a beanie with a ribbed brim as per image 5 11 repeat steps 6 to 10 eight times  construct rounds 1 to round 16b inclusive excluding 16a then 12 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1  skip the remaining rounds and instead stitch count 30 double_crochet and 10 chain 3 space slip_stitch chain 3 space  add the ribbed brim as per finishing round instructions round 9 third round diamond flower 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst solid rounds 2 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches rounds 1 to 6 3 chain 1 and skip all of chain slip_stitch and chain 4 double_crochet in each of next two
